nodes.text: The Starswarm Cluster was an astronomical object located in the regions known as the Deep Core and the Interior. It was also situated in the grid square L-10 of the Standard Galactic Grid.

The Starswarm Cluster was introduced in the current Star Wars canon in the thirty-sixth issue of Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around September 9, 2015. The star cluster known as the Starswarm Cluster was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it appeared in the first issue of The Golden Age of the Sith story arc of the Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi series of comic books. The issue was written by Kevin J. Anderson and penciled by Dario Carrasco, Jr., and it was published on October 9, 1996.
